title: Bright Futures
scholarship details: A Florida-based merit scholarship program that provides funding to Florida residents based on academic achievement for attendance at in-state colleges and universities.

title: The Gates Scholarship
amount: 100% Tuition, fees, room, board, books, and transportation
scholarship details: A highly selective, full-ride scholarship for exceptional minority high school seniors from low-income households who demonstrate strong leadership potential and academic excellence.

title: The Dell Scholars
scholarship details: A scholarship program that recognizes students who have overcome significant obstacles to pursue their education and demonstrate grit, potential, and ambition.

title: Sallie Mae Scholarship
scholarship details: A sweepstakes-style scholarship offering $1,000 to students who register on their website, with monthly drawings for winners.

title: Niche "No Essay" Scholarship
scholarship details: A monthly $2,000 scholarship awarded through a random drawing to students who create a Niche account and complete their profile.

title: Hagan Scholarship
scholarship details: A nationwide need-based merit scholarship providing up to $60,000 over four years to help rural students graduate college debt-free.

title: Regions Riding Foward Scholarship
scholarship details: An essay-based scholarship honoring African American achievements and providing financial support to students who demonstrate leadership and community involvement.

title: "Be Bold" No-Essay Scholarship
scholarship details: A $25,000 scholarship awarded to a student who demonstrates boldness and creativity in their educational journey, without requiring an essay.

title: Jim McKay Graduate Scholarship
scholarship details: A $10,000 scholarship awarded to NCAA student-athletes who demonstrate excellence in academic performance and interest in pursuing careers in sports communications.

title: Student Referee Scholarship
scholarship details: A scholarship program that rewards high school students who complete referee certification and actively officiate youth sports.

title: NSHSS STEAM Scholarship
scholarship details: A merit-based scholarship for high school students pursuing studies in Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics.

title: Elevate Women in Tech Scholarship
scholarship details: A scholarship program designed to support and encourage women pursuing degrees in technology-related fields.

title: Devin Chase Vancil Art and Music Scholarship
scholarship details: A scholarship supporting students pursuing degrees in fine arts, music, or related creative fields.

title: Regeneron Science Talent Search Scholarship
scholarship details: A prestigious science research competition for high school seniors offering significant awards up to $250,000 for original research projects.

title: Cooke College Scholarship Program
scholarship details: A highly selective scholarship providing up to $55,000 per year to high-achieving students with financial need.

title: Greenhouse Scholars Whole Person College Program
scholarship details: A comprehensive scholarship and mentorship program supporting high-performing, under-resourced students throughout their college journey.

title: Mark Kilroy Foundation Scholarships
scholarship details: A scholarship program honoring Mark Kilroy's memory by supporting students pursuing careers in healthcare or medical fields.

title: Levine Scholars Program
scholarship details: UNC Charlotte's most prestigious scholarship program offering full ride plus enrichment funding to exceptional students demonstrating commitment to community service.

title: Jack Kent Cooke Young Artist Award
scholarship details: A scholarship program providing up to $10,000 to extraordinary young musicians who demonstrate financial need.

title: AIM Center for Independent Living Scholarship
scholarship details: A scholarship program supporting students with disabilities pursuing higher education while demonstrating leadership and community involvement.
